description: When using flask to create a web application, a list-based error may occur when attempting to render a template. This occurs when the list of items passed to the template is not properly formatted according to the flask template engine. This will result in a compile/runtime error, which will prevent
code:
# Program to create a list of numbers

# Create an empty list
my_list = []

# Function to add a number to the list
def add_number(num):
    my_list.append(num)

# Function to remove a number
